name: Just Another Game (VerminLord317)
description:
Dear Player,

        Many years ago in a rather large patch of woods, a small family and some help built a house. It was known as Riser Manor, and it's builders were Thomas and Kathrine Riser. They had a son, Me: Jirou Riser, only shortly after it's completion. 

        When I was just ten, my mother passed away. The physicians said it was food poisoning... But was it really food poisoning, or poisoned food?

        Like any young boy, I didn't understand... Receiving mixed teachings and opinions form the many people I was with on a daily basis. It only grew worse when the tragic pattern of house Riser established itself...

        You could read the whole story here, but it's not finished, because you have yet to enter it... As we speak, I am headed back to this old childhood home of mine in search of answers. I will be expecting you...
